name: TC1373-01 - Possibility to leave a “Kinda” mark.
description: LMS-1373 Возможность оставлять пометки kinda. https://app.qase.io/plan/LMS/1?case=1373Objective: Verify that the user can successfully leave a 'Kinda' mark on a flashcard when the card is turned.
